title: RIOT RIGGS LOL AND CHEATS PLAYERS
body: like seriously riot cheats and im the only one that notices it, my moves have been constantly disabled in fights for no reason,  im teamed with bots in ranked that arnt even real players, there riot bots there to make certain players lose, im playing poppy standing right next to a cheater playing kha i q and the game completely ignores my q is activated but the game doesnt let my q hit him, every time i adc i intentionally teamed with a shiit  every time, ive never once not been laned with someone who doesnt intentioanlly feed, i always do 70% less damage then all enemy players, all enemy players always take 50% more damage then i do, the stats of the game have literally been fixed to make me weaker then everyone else, riot cheats, and they support cheaters
